text: Va afrode az sumo, ki memirand va hamsaron [-i ƣajri ʙordor az xud] ʙoqi meguzorand, [on zanon ʙaroi izdivoci mucaddad] ʙojad cahor moh va dah ruz intizor ʙikasand [va idda nigah dorand] va hangome ki muddati iddai xudro ʙa pojon rasonidand, dar mavridi on ci onon ʙa tavri soista [va masru'] dar ʙorai [zindagii] xud ancom dihand, gunohe ʙar sumo [sarparaston] nest; va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned, ogoh ast
